long_description: The SWISS+TECH Screwz-All(R) 7-in-1 keychain tool is small and portable so you always have a screwdriver handy. Has 4 popular screwdrivers, an LED flashlight and rule markings. Four solid stainless-steel screwdrivers: 2 Phillips (#1 and #2); 2 flatheads (#1 and #2). Includes 2 rulers: one with 1/8 in. markings and the other with 5mm markings. Also has an LED flashlight with soft-touch on/off button; comes with 2 coin-style CR1216 3V lithium batteries that can be replaced. The SWISS+TECH Screwz-All(R) 7-in-1 keychain tool has an end opening that lets you attach a keyring or lanyard.
short_description: The SWISS+TECH Screwz-All(R) 7-in-1 keychain tool is small and portable so you always have a screwdriver handy. Has 4 popular screwdrivers, an LED flashlight and rule markings.
